tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medical_inventory (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  exp_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE medical_devices(
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity_in_stock INT,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  purchase_date DATE,
  last_inventory_check DATE
)

CREATE TABLE surgical_kits(
  kit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  kit_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  sterile_status BOOL,
  expiry_date DATE,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  last_used_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE surgical_operations(
  operation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_date DATE,
  surgeon_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  equipment_used UUID[],
  operating_room VARCHAR(255),
  operation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE supplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    surgeon VARCHAR(50),
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(id),
    supply_id INT REFERENCES supplies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE robots (
	r_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	r_name VARCHAR(255),
	r_model VARCHAR(100),
	r_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
	s_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	s_date DATE,
	s_time TIME,
	s_robot_id INT,
	surgeon_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
	e_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	e_name VARCHAR(255),
	e_type VARCHAR(100),
	e_quantity INT,
	e_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE supplies (
	supp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	supp_name VARCHAR(255),
	supp_type VARCHAR(100),
	supp_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	trans_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	trans_type VARCHAR(50),
	trans_date TIMESTAMP,
	trans_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
	trans_description TEXT
)
